de.wirecard.epos

Interface TerminalManager


  • public interface TerminalManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.terminal.AvailableUpdates> availableUpdates(de.wirecard.epos.model.terminal.TerminalUpdateType... updateTypes)
      Check if there is any available update
      de.wirecard.rxparallel.SingleParallel<TerminalDevice,de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> discoverDevices()
      This method is used for scanning of all available devices which are connected to device and selecting one of them.
      io.reactivex.Single<TerminalDevice> getSelectedDevice()
      Method returns actual selected terminal.
      io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.extension.terminal.EposTerminalExtension> getSelectedExtension()
      Method returns actual selected extension.
      io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.Boolean> isInitialized()
      Method returns boolean state, if terminal manager is initialized.
      io.reactivex.Completable resetSelectedDevice()
      Method will reset selected device and extension.
      de.wirecard.rxparallel.CompletableParallel<de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> update(de.wirecard.epos.model.terminal.TerminalUpdateType... updateTypes)
      Perform update of terminal.

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectedExtension

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.extension.terminal.EposTerminalExtension> getSelectedExtension()
        Method returns actual selected extension. Extension can be set by call discoverDevices() method with reaction to event de.wirecard.epos.util.events.acceptance.AvailableTerminalTypesEvent.

      • getSelectedDevice

        io.reactivex.Single<TerminalDevice> getSelectedDevice()
        Method returns actual selected terminal. Terminal can be set by call discoverDevices() method with reaction to event de.wirecard.epos.util.events.acceptance.AvailableTerminalsEvent.

      • resetSelectedDevice

        io.reactivex.Completable resetSelectedDevice()
        Method will reset selected device and extension.

      • isInitialized

        io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.Boolean> isInitialized()
        Method returns boolean state, if terminal manager is initialized. Basically it means, that getSelectedExtension() and getSelectedDevice() return some value and discoverDevices() was properly called.

      • discoverDevices

        de.wirecard.rxparallel.SingleParallel<TerminalDevice,de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> discoverDevices()
        This method is used for scanning of all available devices which are connected to device and selecting one of them. Events: Event.Update, AvailableTerminalTypesEvent, AvailableTerminalsEvent

      • availableUpdates

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.terminal.AvailableUpdates> availableUpdates(de.wirecard.epos.model.terminal.TerminalUpdateType... updateTypes)
        Check if there is any available update

      • update

        de.wirecard.rxparallel.CompletableParallel<de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> update(de.wirecard.epos.model.terminal.TerminalUpdateType... updateTypes)
        Perform update of terminal.
        Parameters:
        updateTypes - You can choose, which update type you want to perform. You can choose one or more. In case you don't put anything, every update type will perform.
